# PrimitiveError.getError() method
<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@esdmr/assert/errors](./esdmr.assert.errors.md) &gt; [PrimitiveError](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror.md) &gt; [getError](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror.geterror.md)


Convert any value to an Error object if it is not already.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static getError<T extends Error>(error: T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  error | T |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

T

Either the thrown value or a new instance of [PrimitiveError](./esdmr.assert.errors.primitiveerror.md)<!-- -->.
